reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: First, I want to say thank you for not having page-turn animation, as I greatly dislike how slow it can be. The only things I would add would be a list view of the books as most of my epubs don\'t have covers, the ability to rate books, and the ability to import folders. It should also organize books into folders based on author in the device filesystem, as a huge pile of books in one folder is very disorganized. Otherwise a lovely, fast loading app.
reviews.author: Tameka Small

reviews.title: Can\'t believe this is free!
reviews.comment: Great app! Better than aldiko and some paid craps.
reviews.author: Noemi Quemado

reviews.comment: Amazing app! It let\'s categories your books. A real advantage for a book ocd (Obsessive Categorizing Disorder in my case) like me. Hands down best book reader ever. No false advertising implied.
reviews.author: Lymae Atienza

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Best FREE reader I have seen yet! Unlike most reader this one reads both PDF & epub. Highlights & notes & other awesome features. Love it:-)
reviews.author: necee necee

reviews.title: App Space zzzzzz
reviews.comment: I need this app for some school related stuff :c I don\'t blame you but I hope you guys can help decrease the app size. x( Firstly, as you can see my phone is a small phone and hence it has very little internal storage space(170MB i think xD). Secondly, even if my phone have very little storage space, i hope this app can at least save it onto my SD card. bc i find it wasteful since no app does that and i still have alot of space in my SD card instead of the internal storage. pls help :c thanks c:
reviews.author: Shakireena AbdurRazaq

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: After trying it, I not only missed the night theme, but the ability to put shortcuts to the books on my home screen like I can with moon reader. You almost had me though!
reviews.author: Caritha Marks

reviews.title: Get it while it is free! Hidden gem!
reviews.comment: Uninstalled Cool reader & paid version of over rated aldiko. Needed a reader which could read from sd card; add annotations & notes & have access to my books thru the cloud. Meets these & more. Love the underlining, wiki &Google search features. I adjust brightness & screen timer through my tablet\'s global setting. Does what it says and more. A must have. I am not a fan of text being read out to me-its a reader and I read. No coplicated dashboards or learning curve. Get it u wont regret.
reviews.author: B Sever

reviews.title: As Close to Ibooks as it Gets
reviews.comment: After frantically searching through at least ten Readers, I would have to say hands down, this is the Best Epub Reader out there, Simple Yet very Effective just like Ibooks, I love the fact that it lets you categorize Books and Has a Nice Looking BookShelf. After trying out Moon Reader,Cool reader ,aldiko, Mantono etc ,etc, This by far ,Meets my expectations for what I needed for theocratic research. Thank You, Thank You, Thank You, Please dont change anything as far as I am concerned.
reviews.author: William Ayenson

reviews.title: SIMPLY ... THE BEST
reviews.comment: I REGRET I PAY FOR ALDICO :-( . THIS IS MUCH BETTER,    AND F R E E !!!!   KEEP THE GOOD WORK :-)
reviews.author: Madeline Hern\303\241ndez

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: I would like to see the \"turn page\" animation, the ability to change font size and background color(themes) and maybe the option to change the size of the bookshelf thumbnails but otherwise a cool app, 3 stars for now
reviews.author: Farzad Slamdien

reviews.title: Great epub & PDF reader
reviews.comment: Great for both epub and PDF, my only complaint is... How do I delete a note or highlighted block, if it had this it would be a 5 star programme.
reviews.author: David Smith

reviews.title: Its awesome
reviews.comment: I love it the only that would make it perfect would be to have more color selection...I do a lot of highlighting and underlining and I use a lot of colors to see the separate sections
reviews.author: Robin DTG

reviews.title: Nice looking reader
reviews.comment: Took me a little while to find resizing, but so far a good reader. The maximum scaling factor is not big enough.
reviews.author: Rabid Mutant

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I love this reader app. I really like that it has highlight AND underline, and the color choices. However, since I use it for studying, if they could add a \'bookmark\' feature similar to Kindle, that would make it absolutely perfect. :)
reviews.author: Blaze C.

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: One of the best epub and pdf reader..very good features for free.only missing factor is option to zoom
reviews.author: Srinath T K

reviews.title: How do I delete highlights???
reviews.comment: Everything is really nice but without the ability to delete underlines or highlights is not very practical to use.
reviews.author: Johnny Duran

reviews.comment: Verry good ap. Wished i could handwright notes & edit
reviews.author: Vladimir Jeannot
